sentences: Mateusz Maurycy Śmierzchalski (born 18 July 1982, Gdynia, Poland), stage name Havoc, is a Polish heavy metal musician.
He is best known for being the former rhythm guitarist for Behemoth.
Since 1999, he is lead guitarist of the sludge-doom metal band Blindead.
Mateusz Śmierzchalski is endorsed by Mayones.
Live Eschaton (2000, VHS, Metal Mind Records)
